Detailed Description

Thread safe message storage.

Possably [depreciated]... ATM seems useable, but all this stuff could be done in NetworkClient (at the expense of its simplicity.)

messageId The packet ID which CE should act on.

Member Data Documentation

CL_Mutex* FusionEngine::FusionNetworkMessageQueue::m_Mutex [protected]
 

Used for thread-safety.

Ensures thread-safety by preventing concurrent data access via _getMessages().
